name: Game Boy Modern Story
description:
- A MODERN STORY -

Your best friend Trail can't wait to play the "raddest game ever" and neither do you. Problem is, you don't have enough money!

Your objective is to earn money by helping your neighbours and doing... well, questionable things. 

- HOW TO PLAY -

The game plays like any classic game boy rpg. You move your character with the D-pad and interact with objects/people with the "A" button. Press START to open the item menu.

When you investigate an area, you'll shift to a first-person perspective. When that happens, just move the cursor around with the D-pad and interact with the environment by pressing the "A" button.

If you want to save the game, just talk to Trail.

- DISCLAIMER -

This is a very short game I've made in less than a week to test GB Studio. Please don't expect anything super-awesome. It's not.

You can play the game on your browser or download the ROM and play it on original hardware/your favourite emulator.

The are two endings  and a couple of  easter eggs. Nothing happens if you find'em, but you'd make me really happy :)
